availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles B. McQuinn, Jr. (Breathitt County, Kentucky, grocer.)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, grocer. Kentucky native. Son of Charles B. McQuinn, Sr., and Lucy McDaniel McQuinn. Married to Esther Howard McQuinn. Father of Jeremiah McQuinn, Reuben McQuinn, Emily McQuinn, Maranda McQuinn, Elizabeth McQuinn, James Buchanan McQuinn, John C. Breckenridge McQuinn, and Nancy McQuinn. Resident of Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocer in Breathitt County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Breathitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 23B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 366.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, Precinct 1, p. 426A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994029, Breathitt County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Breathitt County Marriages, Film 000836546.
"Charles Brook 'C. B.' McQuinn (1820-1905)," Find A Grave, Memorial 53733929, accessed November 2, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/53733929.
